name: Zoho Inventory Getting Started Setup
description: Navigate to Zoho Inventory and configure initial settings on the getting started page

steps.name: Configure chat settings
steps.ai_instruction: Enable pause chat setting if not already enabled
steps.snippet: await page.evaluate(() => { const input = document.querySelector('input[name="wms_settings_pausechat"]'); if(input && !input.checked) input.click(); });

steps.name: Enable global sound settings
steps.snippet: await page.evaluate(() => { const input = document.querySelector('input[name="wms_settings_sound_global"]'); if(input && !input.checked) input.click(); });

steps.name: Configure message sound settings
steps.ai_instruction: Enable sound notifications for my messages, mentions, and group messages
steps.snippet: await page.evaluate(() => { ['wms_settings_sound_mymsg', 'wms_settings_sound_mention', 'wms_settings_sound_groupmsg'].forEach(name => { const input = document.querySelector(`input[name="${name}"]`); if(input && !input.checked) input.click(); }); });

steps.name: Complete setup
steps.ai_instruction: Verify all settings are saved and complete the getting started process
